name: Seriesguide-chrome
tagline: A chrome plugin to manage your favorite tv-shows and their schedules with automagic ThePirateBay integration
body:
seriesguide-chrome
==================

A chrome plugin to manage your favorite tv-shows and their schedules with automagic ThePirateBay integration


Installation: 
* download the .crx file
* Open your chrome extensions tab
* drag the crx to the extensions tab to install

Add your favorite series to the list and then click one to view the schedule.
Behind each episode that's aired is a magnet link. Click that to automatically check thepiratebay for the torrent with the most seeds for <seriesname> S<season>E<episode>.
Click the magnet link behind a torrent to download it.

C'est ca!
